name: Roshan's Banner
description: Another one of the Immortal's kill rewards, something feels familiar about this ancient banner.

abilities.name: Place Banner
abilities.description: Places a banner on the point-targeted location that grants an invulnerability aura to lane creeps within the radius for the entire duration of the banner.
notes: Pings the minimap and shows the banner's location
Prints a message with the hero minimap icon
Creates an aura centered around the banner granting all ability effects
Cannot be placed within the fountain area
Cannot be placed within Roshan's pit
The aura only affects lane creeps, including lane creeps affected by dominate sources
Trees within 200-radius are destroyed upon cast
Creeps affected by the banner's aura will not be affected by Glyph of Fortification as the two use the same modifier
Creeps' attacks are not effective on Roshan's Banner
Melee hero attacks are more effective on Roshan's Banner

additionalInfo: On his second death and onwards, Roshan drops Roshan's Banner as a second item if he was slain in the Radiant pit. In the Dire pit, he drops a Cheese instead.
Roshan's Banner is consumed upon use. It does not have a charge counter, and multiple Roshan's Banners do not stack in the inventory.
Against Roshan's Banner: Attacks from heroes deal 4 damage, Attacks from creeps deal 1 damage.
Unlike the Aegis of the Immortal, Roshan's Banner is not reclaimed by Roshan.
